name: Story
description: Story is a purpose-built layer 1 blockchain designed specifically to onramp intellectual property (IP) to the blockchain and make it programmable. Story tokenizes any type of IP; whether thatâ€™s an idea, an image, a real world asset, a song, an AI model, an NFT or anything in-between. By embedding usage terms, attribution, and royalty agreements directly into the blockchain, Story provides a transparent, decentralized solution for IP management. This enables IP holders to protect their work, collaborate on IP seamlessly, and unlock revenue opportunities in an AI-powered economy.
